1567104740_1HiD82hP36YF93PEqKcgdgfgmAq8U.body:
> [slim2k](#comment_5_1HiD82hP36YF93PEqKcgdgfgmAq8UigrjD)

The idea of being able to subscribe to other's blacklists seems interesting to me. It combines the advantages of moderation, but also allows you the choice of who's blacklist you subscribe to, meaning you essentially pick the ones that do the moderation for you.

1567252307_1PPUrYcZ1E1rGkkE6PH18Qi43LRsK.body: Pro-tip: If you're from a country that's been at odds with the country you're living in, and part of a religion that's been at odds with the majority population of the country you're living in... move.
